Text:
many thanks
I always look out for your ups they are always fantastic quality

Also since there's absolutely ZERO reason to RAR torrents this eztv up of the immerse version is far superior to the other's that throw them up RAR'd - like 'scenebalance' does, for instance.  Nice of scenebalance to up it but really just useless to not unRAR it for us first.
thanks uploader, best show on TV right now, buscemi is the man

Thanks for another great up.

Can anyone explain situations where it is better to use iso or rar format (at least when there is no compression possible in rar). If there's no compression, what is the point?
zymod - The rar releases are also posted to newsgroups (google NNTP) and other file-size-limited file sharing sites - it doesn't have any benefit for people torrenting.
